text: Wake in Fright is a 1971 Australian British American drama thriller movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and was based on the 1961 novel of the same name by Kenneth Cook. It stars Gary Bond, Donald Pleasence, Chips Rafferty, Jack Thompson, John Meillon and was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * Category:1971 drama movies Category:1971 thriller movies Category:1971 LGBT movies Category:Australian drama movies Category:Australian thriller movies Category:Australian LGBT movies Category:British drama movies Category:British thriller movies Category:British LGBT movies Category:American drama movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff Category:Movies set in deserts
title: Wake in Fright
